channel.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
channel.description:
Hi,
I just wanted to know if there is a way to play on a RSC server without port forwarding. I downloaded a client and a server, How do you just go on it without port forwarding?
Thanks.

item.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
item.dc:creator: @Spyke8x Spyke8x
item.description:
@Spyke8x wrote:

unless you have a router there is no need for port forwarding…

Read full topic
item.source: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!

item.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
item.dc:creator: @F_BaBy F BaBy
item.description:
@F_BaBy wrote:

Download apache ant, wampserver, a rsc source, set the paths in the .bat files, put the www files in wamps www folder, compile, run.

Read full topic

[quote=“X Screech X, post:15, topic:228516”]Ok, then, all you should’ve said was ‘That’s too hard to do’.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2008, 03:07:50 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Rs Classic link=topic=300466.msg2411658#msg2411658 date=1219957631]

Right… Ok, I see… I’m a retard for asking a question… And I’m also a retard for trying to avoid fighting…? lol.

Yes your a complete retard.
[/quote]
Screw off…? Problem solved…[/quote]I said that, you idiot.

item.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
item.dc:creator: @public_void_mscpidio public void mscpidiots()
item.description:
@public_void_mscpidio wrote:

[quote=“X Screech X, post:9, topic:228516”]OMG… I’m not trying to set it up…, nor am I trying to start a fight, that is the last thing I want to do. All I want to do is run the server, and get on there without setting it up.[/quote]That is setting it up you retard. You HAVE to set it up for it to work. You have to import the sql file, register, fix the paths, fix the o_base_url bug, run the client, run the server and log in. It’s a lot harder to do than rs2 because like I said, you have to know what you’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
item.dc:creator: @public_void_mscpidio public void mscpidiots()
item.description:
@public_void_mscpidio wrote:

[quote=“X Screech X, post:7, topic:228516”]Okay, just stop… Is it possible to ask a simple question without 10 people yelling you out like you just DoS’d their server…? Again… Is this possible, if so, how?[/quote]

And yes its possible, but I’m not going to spend hours helping you, nor will anyone else. RSC is a lot harder than RS2 to set up because you actually have to know what the fuck your doing because theres no tutorials.
Listen to my advice and play other servers, nobody(in their right mind) is going to spend hours helping you set up an rsc server.

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
item.dc:creator: @public_void_mscpidio public void mscpidiots()
item.description:
@public_void_mscpidio wrote:

[quote=“X Screech X, post:5, topic:228516”]Yes, but I want to play privately on my own server… Not for public, just to log in like you do on RuneScape 2 servers where you run it but put no IP. Is it possible to something like that on a RSC server??[/quote]Hmm how can I make it any more clear for you… [size=50pt]Don’t try running a server if you don’t know what you’re doing, play other servers.[/size] And yes its possible, but I’m not going to spend hours helping you, nor will anyone else. RSC is a lot harder than RS2 to set up because you actually have to know what the fuck your doing because theres no tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Yes, but I want to play privately on my own server… Not for public, just to log in like you do on RuneScape 2 servers where you run it but put no IP. Is it possible to something like that on a RSC server??

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question. Appreciated if awnsered!
item.dc:creator: @public_void_mscpidio public void mscpidiots()
item.description:
@public_void_mscpidio wrote:

[quote=“X Screech X, post:3, topic:228516”]Ok, I did that, but, it’s telling me to register. I’m not trying to register it anytime soon, I’m just trying to go on it so I can get on whenever I want. It says both worlds are offline even though I changed ‘Settings.cfg’ to Localhost…[/quote][quote=“public void mscpidiots(), post:2, topic:228516”]LOL… You use localhost. Don’t try running a server if you don’t know what you’re doing, play other servers. Look for a server to play in http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,119.0.html.[/quote]Hope I made it more clear for you.

Read full topic
